item.title: Ghettoscape need advice
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Getting analed by KBD and Face Fudged by Bandos has always been a turn on. Armadyl going “kree” sounds like its having an orgy with Saradomin “suck my godsword”.

I mean it’s your server not mine so I think you can be the weird one and implement the idea.

I’ll deffo play and donate for virtual condoms
